title: I Froze in the middle of a game and I can't disconnect or move(It Has Been Doing So The Past Hour)
body:
I was playing a coop vs ai with my friend(he's new at lol) and suddenly i couldn't move or disconnect and it has been frozen like this for the past 2 hours almost as if you had high ping. 
Does anybody know how to leave the game or fix the issue or do I have to wait for rito?(I've tried disconnecting,  even restart the league client and my computer)

replies.body: This sounds very similair to the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) freezing issue.  Some players would get this after updating their Windows 10, which auto-enabled the game bar that caused this.  See if disabling that helps!  Test it out in a custom game though, to prevent any penalties.
